vlive.korean: 저희가 더 성장할 수 있는 발판이 됐다고 생각하거든요. I believe that became a stepping stone for us to grow more on. 듣기 View video StarNews : ★ 뉴이스트W "'W' 사라져도 우리는 변하지 않아" (NU'EST W) 차한잔합시다 2부 ★
vlive.english: I believe that became a stepping stone for us to grow more on.

vlive.korean: 이번 앨범부터는 약간 골든 차일드가 시즌 2로 넘어가는 그런 발판이 되는 앨범이지 않을까 싶습니다. I think that starting with this album, this album will be a foothold for season 2 of Golden Child. 듣기 View video Golden Child : [FULL] Golden Child 3RD MINI ALBUM [WISH] COMEBACK SHOWCASE
vlive.english: I think that starting with this album, this album will be a foothold for season 2 of Golden Child.

examples.korean: We need the steps to get into the attic. 발음듣기 우리는 다락에 올라가려면 발판사다리가 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We need the steps to get into the attic. 발음

examples.korean: The company now has a firm footing in the marketplace. 발음듣기 그 회사는 이제 시장에서 발판을 단단히 다졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company now has a firm footing in the marketplace. 발음

examples.korean: The firm is anxious to gain a toehold in Europe. 발음듣기 그 회사는 유럽에서 발판을 마련하기를 열망하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The firm is anxious to gain a toehold in Europe. 발음

examples.korean: The company is eager to gain a foothold in Europe. 발음듣기 그 회사는 유럽에서 발판을 다지기를 열망하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company is eager to gain a foothold in Europe. 발음
